name: Havoc
description: Havoc is a support machine gun title defined by very high fire rate and a larger magazine. Its damage and accuracy can vary widely, but the class is strongest in short, brutal firefights against mobs or a single tough target.
notes: The Havoc title (Title_Firerate1_Havoc) is granted only to Support Machine Guns with fire rate above 10.0 and increases magazine capacity to offset the heavy ammo consumption.
